DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Clinical assessment ( anthropometric ) paraclinical ( biochemical immunological dose serum insuline growth factor IGF1 IGF2 receptor ) neonates intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) integration multidimensional statistical model . Objectives : 1 . IGF1 IGF2 evaluation serum IGF1 receptor , IGF2 receptor IGF2 receptor gene expression cord blood newborn intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) . ( Prospective ) 2 . Evaluation monitoring anthropometric , clinical ( non-cardiac morbidity ) paraclinical . ( Retrospective & prospective ) 3 . Evaluation monitor morphological functional echocardiography . ( Prospective ) 4 . Integrating multidimensional clinical paraclinical parameter statistical model evaluate newborn intrauterine growth restriction .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Infants With Intrauterine Growth Restriction
DOC.criteria: newborn intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) : weight 10th percentile gestational age parental consent enrollment IUGR neonates context chromosomopathies : trisomy 21 , trisomy 18. neonate congenital heart disease twin refusal parent participation study
